title: Weekend of Shadows
creator_credit: Tom Jeffrey, Matt Carroll and Samson Productions
brief_description: A small country town in the thirties. A farmer’s wife is murdered and suspicion immediately falls on a Polish labourer who has disappeared. The local policeman forms a posse to search for the missing man. Tension mount amongst the members of the posse, all of whom have a past secret to hide or live down. Cast includes John Waters. Photography: Richard Wallace ; writer, Peter Yeldham.
